backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing an e-commerce backend with access control, user profiles, product catalog, carts, and orders. It enforces admin/user permissions and provides CRUD operations for products, profiles, carts, and order lifecycle.
feature_evidence.json: Structured report listing frontend features implemented around admin claim, transfer, and error handling flows, including affected files, dependencies, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-written summaries of most frontend React files, describing pages, components, hooks, and their roles in the Khan Mobile Zone application.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining design tokens, light/dark theme variables, and base styles for the application UI.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that defines the root DOM node and loads the React application bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application entry that configures TanStack Router routes, wraps the app in a theme provider, and mounts global UI utilities like the toaster.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProductEdi: Admin-only React form component for adding or editing products, managing local form state and emitting a typed Product object on save.
frontend/src/components/admin/TransferAd: Modal dialog that lets the current admin transfer admin ownership after typing a confirmation phrase, using a mutation hook and showing error states and loading feedback.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Reusable access-denied screen that displays an admin permission error message with an icon and either custom actions or a default button to navigate home.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button wired to Internet Identity that handles authentication state, loading UI, error recovery, and clears cached queries on logout.
frontend/src/components/cart/CartLineIte: Renders a single cart item with product info, quantity controls, remove action, and total price, updating the cart via mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/catalog/ProductC: Product listing card showing image, name, price, brand badge, and an add-to-cart button with stock handling and toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/checkout/Deliver: Checkout form for collecting and validating delivery address details, emitting a valid address or null to the parent via a callback.
frontend/src/components/checkout/Payment: Radio-based selector for choosing a payment method (cash on delivery or online card) and reporting the selected backend enum value.
frontend/src/components/home/ExplosivePh: Homepage hero section with a canvas-based particle explosion animation that respects reduced-motion preferences and includes navigation CTA content.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Renders the site footer with brand info, quick navigation links, contact details, and a copyright section with a heart icon and external link.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Implements a responsive site header with logo, navigation links, cart button showing item count, and a mobile slide-out menu.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Defines the main page layout wrapping content with a persistent header and footer and rendering routed pages via an Outlet.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Modal dialog that forces users to complete their profile by submitting name, email, and phone using a backend mutation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on the current Internet Identity, handling authentication, admin initialization, and query invalidation on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminBootstrap.ts: Provides mutations to claim or transfer admin privileges and refreshes cached caller role state on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useCallerRole.ts: Fetches the current caller’s user role from the backend using the active actor, defaulting to guest on errors.
frontend/src/hooks/useCart.ts: Manages cart state with queries and mutations, enriching cart items with product data and exposing helpers for add, update, and count operations.
frontend/src/hooks/useCheckout.ts: Handles checkout by submitting delivery and payment details to the backend and clearing cart-related caches on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an authentication context and provider for Internet Identity, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient configuration.
frontend/src/hooks/useProducts.ts: Provides React Query hooks to fetch all products and to add, update, or delete products via the backend actor, with cache invalidation on mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines hooks to fetch and save the caller’s user profile using React Query, handling actor readiness, loading state composition, and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind CSS layers and defines extensive CSS variables for light and dark themes, including colors, radius, and base element styles.
frontend/src/lib/catalog.ts: Contains a helper function that maps numeric brand IDs to human-readable brand names with a fallback to 'Unknown'.
frontend/src/lib/format.ts: Provides utility functions to format numbers as PKR currency strings and to convert bigint values to numbers.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React application by creating the root, configuring the React Query client, and wrapping the app with query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutProfilePage.tsx: Renders a static about page describing Khan Mobile Zone with profile image, business description, and contact information.
frontend/src/pages/AccessoriesPage.tsx: Displays accessory products filtered by category, showing category icons, loading skeletons, empty states, and a responsive product grid.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Implements the admin panel with authentication, role checks, profile setup gating, and full product management (add, edit, delete) plus admin claim/transfer flows.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Shows the shopping cart with loading and empty states, lists cart items, calculates totals, and provides navigation to checkout.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Handles checkout flow including authentication, profile setup, delivery address, payment selection, order placement, and success confirmation display.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Renders a static Contact Us page with phone and email cards, call-to-action buttons, and store visit info using Tailwind UI and lucide icons.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Implements the homepage with an animated hero, feature highlights, and a CTA section that navigates users to the mobiles catalog.
frontend/src/pages/MobilesPage.tsx: Displays a mobiles catalog page that fetches products, supports brand-based filtering (Oppo, Vivo, Infinix), and shows loading skeletons or product cards.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utility functions to read URL parameters (including hash routing), persist them in sessionStorage, and manage stored parameters safely.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS with dark mode, custom container settings, extended color palette via CSS variables, animations, and additional plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks the overall project state, schema version, and implemented features for the Khan Mobile Zone website, including catalog, checkout, branding, and animations.
